lead_paragraph: "By the way, if she gets to pick her judges, nothing you can do, folks. Although the Second Amendment people — maybe there is, I don't know." — Donald Trump to supporters in North Carolina, igniting a fresh political firestorm by declaring gun rights supporters might still find a way to stop Hillary Clinton. Trump later denied any insinuation of violence, saying he was referring to the power of voters.
